krazconfig.visual.hideStatusEffects.desc: Hides the visual display of status effects across the HUD, inventory, and other relevant UI elements.
krazconfig.visual.inventory.hideRecipeBo: Hides the recipe book from the inventory screen.
krazconfig.visual.inventory.cancelSlotHi: No Slot Highlight on Empty Tooltip
Disables the visual highlight effect on inventory slots for items that do not display a tooltip.
krazconfig.visual.inventory.cancelClicks: No Slot Click on Empty Tooltip
Prevents clicks on slots containing items that have no tooltips.
krazconfig.chat.compactInputBox.descript: Makes the chat input box the same size as the chat history box.
krazconfig.chat.compactInputBoxMinimumWi: The minimum width of the input box that the will be allowed.
krazconfig.chat.includeChatTimestamps.de: Displays the time when each chat message was sent alongside the message.
krazconfig.chat.chatTimestampPattern.des:
Defines the format pattern for chat message timestamps.

NOTE: If pattern is invalid, then the default pattern of 'HH:mm:ss' is used instead!
krazconfig.misc.ignoreSignatureErrors.de: Prevents signature-related errors from cluttering your logs.
